summary: A Parisian descendant of Don Juan vows to stop philandering in order to win the hand of a virtous young lady with a disapproving father.
cast: Frank Fay|Laura La Plante|Joan Blondell|Charles Winninger|Alan Mowbray|Arthur Edmund Carewe|Billy House|Yola d'Avril|John T. Murray|Louise Brooks|Margaret Livingston|Armand Kaliz|Charles Judels|Tyrell Davis|Eleanor Gutöhrlein|Karla Gutöhrlein|Ethlyne Clair|Bill Elliott|Hazel Howell|Alphonse Martell|Nina Quartero
keywords: manipulative female|female jealousy|possessive female|father daughter relationship|medical diagnosis
title: God's Gift to Women
